name: MPES - Darken
description: Description : Install script ini untuk mengubah MilkyPartyEleganStyle menjadi lebih gelap. Notice ! Install MilkyPartyEleganStyle Part 1 & Part 2 terlebih dahulu sebelum menginstall script ini. For more information about this style, please visit our Thread
css: @-moz-document url-prefix("http://forum.indowebster.com") {  body .popupbody li a, body .popupbody li label, body #above_threadlist + #pagetitle:before { background-color: transparent !important; } body .threadbit > div > *[class^="thr"]:nth-child(2n):not(.threadimod) { background: rgba(0,0,0,0.03) !important; } html { background-color: rgb(200, 200, 200) !important; } body .cke_skin_kama .cke_editor .cke_rcombo a, body .cke_skin_kama .cke_editor .cke_toolgroup { background-color: rgb(216, 216, 216) !important; } body .button, body .textcontrol, body input[type='submit'], body input[type='button'], body #above_searchresults, body #pagetitle + #above_postlist, body #usercss > #postlist > #above_postlist, body #view-visitor_messaging > #postlist > #above_postlist, body #pagetitle + #controls_above, body #usercp_thanks_table .blocksubhead, body #usercss > #postlist > .userprof_title, body #view-visitor_messaging > #postlist > .userprof_title, body #above_searchresults > #pagination_top, body #usercss #above_postlist > #pagination_top, body #pagetitle + #above_postlist > #pagination_top, body .profile_content #above_postlist > #pagination_top, body #pagetitle + #controls_above > #pagination_top { background-color: rgb(228, 228, 228) !important; } body h3.blocksubhead, body #message_list li.postbit, body #usercp_nav .blocksubhead, body .formcontrols h3.blocksubhead, body #searchtypeswitcher + .blockbody > .blocksubhead { background: rgb(232,232,232)!important; } body #pollinfo, body #notices + #announcements, body .threadbit:nth-child(2n), body #usercp_content .threadbit:nth-child(2n), body #discussionlist .threadbit .discussionrow, body #profile_tabs .tabslight > dd.userprof_module > a { background: rgb(236, 236, 236) !important; } body blockquote dl > dd, body .content .postcontent dl > dd, body blockquote div[style^="overflow:auto"], body .reputationbits .summaryinfo .iteminfo dl > dd, body select, body textarea, body .textbox, body .navlinks, body #navlinks, body .threadbit, body .popupbody, body .breadcrumb > ul, body .posterlist .blockrow, body .texteditor textarea, body .texteditor.forum textarea, body .profile_content > *, body #controls_below:before, body #whoposted > .blockfoot, body #attachments > .blockfoot, body #usercp_content .threadbit, body #discussionlist .threadbit .discussionrow:hover, body #usercp_nav > .block:last-child > .blockbody > ul > li, body #view-usertags .member_content .subsectionhead-understate, body #view-quotes .member_content .subsectionhead-understate, body #view-mentions .member_content .subsectionhead-understate, body #view-hashes .member_content .subsectionhead-understate, body #message_list li.postbit .content:not(.texteditor), body #message_list li.postbit .userprof_vmright, body #message_list li.postbit .postbithead + div, body #message_list li.postbit > blockquote.floatcontainer, body .texteditor.forum .cke_skin_kama textarea.cke_source, body .texteditor.content .cke_skin_kama textarea.cke_source, body #usercss #blogform > #blogentries.bloglist > li.postcontainer, body #forumbits > .forumhead + ol > li.forumbit_post:first-child, body .forumbit_nopost > .forumhead + ol > li.forumbit_post:first-child, body #pagetitle + #above_searchresults + .searchresults > .blockbody > #searchbits, body #searchtypeswitcher + .blockbody > .blocksubhead:first-child + div, body #searchtypeswitcher + .blockbody > form > .blocksubhead:first-child + div{ background-color: rgb(242, 242, 242) !important; } body .toolsmenu.thread_controls > div, body #above_postlist > #pagination_top > .pagination{ background: #d6d6d6 !important; } body .navlinks > a { background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #ececec,#e3e3e3,#dadada) !important; background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #ececec,#e3e3e3,#dadada) !important; } body #above_threadlist + #pagetitle:after { background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08) 10%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12) 30%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.13) 70%,rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.16) 90%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.23) 100%) !important; background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #ededed 4%, #e4e4e4 20%, #dedede 85%, #d6d6d6) !important; } body #above_threadlist > a.newcontent_textcontrol:hover, body #above_threadlist + #pagetitle + #ShowthreadHeaderAd + div a:hover { background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #f2f2f2 4%, #ebebeb 20%, #e5e5e5 85%, #d7d7d7 100%) !important; background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #f2f2f2 4%, #ebebeb 20%, #e5e5e5 85%, #d7d7d7 100%) !important; } body #above_postlist + #pagetitle > h1{ background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #e5e5e5 12px, #dbdbdb 24px, #d6d6d6 40px, #d6d6d6 100%) !important; background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #e5e5e5 12px, #dbdbdb 24px, #d6d6d6 40px, #d6d6d6 100%) !important; } body #pagetitle:before, body #message_list + *:before, body .cp_content #threads + *:before, body #discussionlist + .blockfoot:before, body #pmfolderlist > .blockbody + .blockfoot:before, body .breadcrumb > ul:before, body h4.collapse:before, body div.collapse:not(#wgo):before, body #comments_heading:before, body #grouppagetitle:before, body #usercp_content #threadlist #jump-to-folder:before, body #eventSlide:before, body #blogentries:before, body #view-hashes:before, body #picturecontainer:before, body h2 + .blockbody:before, body h4.collapse + div:before, body div.collapse + div:not(#wgo):before, body div.collapse + ol:before, body .forumhead:not(.collapse) + ol:before, body .blockhead + div:not([id="pollresults"]):before, body .blockhead + ul:before, body .blockhead + ol:not(#message_list):before, body .blockhead + form:before, body .blockhead + * + form:before, body .blockhead + * + .blockbody:not([id="pollresults"]):before, body .blockhead + * + .wysiwyg_block:before, body #content_inner > .blogentrybit:before, body #searchtypeswitcher + .blockbody:before, body #forum_icon_legend > h5 + dl:before, body #forum_icon_legend > h5 + .blockbody:before, body #content_container #view-group-description:before, body #usercp_content > .cp_content > .blockhead + .block:before, body form[action^="blog_usercp"] > .blockbody:before, body .profile_widgets .blocksubhead + div:before, body .blockhead + #uploaddisplay + #view-group-pictures:before, body .postcontainer:not(.blogentrybit):not([id^="vmessage"]):not(blockquote):before, body .postbitignored:before, body .postbitdeleted:before { content: ' '; display: block; position: absolute; z-index: -10; top: 0px; left: 0px; right: 0px; bottom: 0px; background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.04) !important; } body .notices li { background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #f0f0f0 10%, #eaeaea 95%, #e2e2e2 100%) !important; background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #f0f0f0 10%, #eaeaea 95%, #e2e2e2 100%) !important; } body #below_buddylist_pagenav .pagination, body #notices + #controls_above .pagination, body #notices ~ br + #controls_below .pagination, body #above_discussions > #pagination_top .pagination { background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #E6E6E6 , #D6D6D6) !important; background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #E6E6E6 , #D6D6D6) !important; } body #blog_title, body #view-aboutme .subsectionhead, body #view-friends-content > .subsectionhead, body #view-blog > .subsectionhead:first-of-type, body #view-blog .blogentrybit > .blogentryhead { background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #f6f6f6, #e8e8e8) !important; }  body h3.blocksubhead, body .formcontrols h3.blocksubhead, body #usercp_nav .blocksubhead, body #searchtypeswitcher + .blockbody > .blocksubhead { border-top: 1px solid whitesmoke !important; } body #above_postlist + #pagetitle > h1 > span { border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(198, 198, 198) !important; } body .postbitlegacy .postbody, body .eventbit .eventdetails .eventbody { border-left: 1px solid #DDDDDD !important; } body #message_list li.postbit .content:not(.texteditor), body #message_list li.postbit .userprof_vmright, body #message_list li.postbit .postbithead + div, body #message_list li.postbit > blockquote.floatcontainer { border-left: 1px solid #d8d8d8 !important;
